notes.title: Funding
notes.p: The work presented in this review was partially funded by CNR project Green & Circular Economy, FOE-2019 DBA.AD003.139 and by the project BOBCATâ€”Biotecnologie per la produzione sostenibile di bio-materiali e prodotti specialistici utilizzando colture cellulari di cardo come bioraffineria, Fondazione Cariplo (2018-0955).
